CustomField.inlineHelpText: Selecting a 1 year recency will include contacts who are active magazine or newsletter subscribers, who were created within 1 year, whose job role was verified within 1 year, or who engaged with a webinar, event, paper, email, or are visited our website within 1 year. Selected 2 years will expand this recency criteria to 2 years.
CustomField.label: Contact Recency
